Module com.gersonfaneto.yams
Package com.gersonfaneto.yams.controllers

Class ServicesController

java.lang.Object
com.gersonfaneto.yams.controllers.ServicesController
public abstract class ServicesController extends Object
Controller containing all the operations related with the Service and WorkOrder models on the System, such as creating, updating and retrieving information about them. Most of the operations relly on the CRUD operations accessed through the DAO.
See Also:
  • ServiceMemoryDAO
  • ServiceCRUD
  • Service
  • WorkOrderMemoryDAO

  • Method Details

    • createWorkOrder

      public static WorkOrder createWorkOrder(String clientID, List<Service> chosenServices) throws ClientNotFoundException
      Generates a new WorkOrder with the Services selected by the Client.
      Parameters:
      clientID - The ID of the Client..
      chosenServices - A list of Services selected by the Client.
      Returns:
      The generated WorkOrder.
      Throws:
      ClientNotFoundException - If the clientID doesn't match any of the ones from the registered Clients.
      See Also:
      • Client
      • WorkOrder

    • listWorkOrders

      public static List<WorkOrder> listWorkOrders()
      Creates a "Queue" of the WorkOrders on the System, by selecting only the ones at the Created State and sorting them by time of creation.
      Returns:
      A list of the found WorkOrders.
      See Also:
      • WorkOrder

    • createService

      public static Service createService(String serviceType, String serviceDescription, List<Component> usedComponents) throws ServiceTypeNotFoundException
      Generates a new Service requested by the Client.
      Parameters:
      serviceType - The type of the Service.
      serviceDescription - The description of the Service.
      usedComponents - The list of the Components to be used in the Service .
      Returns:
      The generated Service.
      Throws:
      ServiceTypeNotFoundException - If the serviceType doesn't match any of the ones declared on the ServiceType enumeration.
      See Also:
      • Service
      • ServiceType

    • removeService

      public static Service removeService(String workOrderID, String serviceID) throws ServiceNotFoundException, WorkOrderNotFoundException, UnsupportedOperationException
      Attempts to remove a Service from a WorkOrder.
      Parameters:
      workOrderID - The ID of the targeted WorkOrder.
      serviceID - The ID of the targeted Service.
      Returns:
      The removed Service.
      Throws:
      ServiceNotFoundException - If the serviceID doesn't match any of the ones from the registered Services.
      WorkOrderNotFoundException - If the workOrderID doesn't match any of the ones from the registered WorkOrders.
      UnsupportedOperationException - If the targeted Service was already completed or the current State of the WorkOrder doesn't allow the removal of it.
      See Also:
      • Service
      • WorkOrder
      • State

    • listServices

      public static List<Service> listServices(String workOrderID) throws WorkOrderNotFoundException
      Retrieves a list of all the Services related to a given WorkOrder.
      Parameters:
      workOrderID - The ID of the targeted WorkOrder.
      Returns:
      A list of Services.
      Throws:
      WorkOrderNotFoundException - If the workOrderID doesn't match any of the ones from the registered WorkOrders.
      See Also:
      • Service
      • WorkOrder

    • markAsDone

      public static Service markAsDone(String serviceID) throws ServiceNotFoundException
      Updates a Service by marking it as done, that is, setting its isDone attribute to true.
      Parameters:
      serviceID - The ID of the targeted Service.
      Returns:
      The updated Service.
      Throws:
      ServiceNotFoundException - If the serviceID doesn't match any of the ones from the registered Services.
      See Also:
      • Service

    • openWorkOrder

      public static WorkOrder openWorkOrder(String technicianID) throws UserNotFoundException, WorkOrderNotFoundException, UnsupportedOperationException
      Attempts to open a WorkOrder for a given Technician, depending on the current State of both of them.
      Parameters:
      technicianID - The ID of the Technician.
      Returns:
      The updated WorkOrder.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the technicianID doesn't match any of the ones from the registered Technicians.
      WorkOrderNotFoundException - If there's no WorkOrder available to be opened.
      UnsupportedOperationException - If the current Technician already has a WorkOrder opened.
      See Also:
      • Technician
      • State
      • WorkOrder
      • State

    • closeWorkOrder

      public static WorkOrder closeWorkOrder(String technicianID) throws UserNotFoundException, UnsupportedOperationException
      Attempts to close the WorkOrder of a given Technician, depending on the current State of both of them.
      Parameters:
      technicianID - The ID of the Technician.
      Returns:
      The updated WorkOrder.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the technicianID doesn't match any of the ones from the registered Technicians.
      UnsupportedOperationException - If the Technician doesn't have an opened WorkOrder or if there are any Services on the WorkOrder still pending.
      See Also:
      • Technician
      • State
      • WorkOrder
      • Service

    • cancelWorkOrder

      public static WorkOrder cancelWorkOrder(String technicianID) throws UserNotFoundException, UnsupportedOperationException
      Attempts to cancel the WorkOrder of a given Technician, depending on the current State of both of them.
      Parameters:
      technicianID - The ID of the Technician.
      Returns:
      The updated WorkOrder.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the technicianID doesn't match any of the ones from the registered Technicians.
      UnsupportedOperationException - If the Technician doesn't have an opened WorkOrder or if there are any Services on the WorkOrder still pending.
